tool_description: A simple Cryptocurrency API For Generate New Address, Checking Wallet Balance and Transfer Coin to another wallet.
name: Chainshub
title: Chainshub

api_list.name: EVM Base
api_list.description: This endpoint use for coin base on EVM Base

api_list.name: Check Balance

required_parameters.name: coin
required_parameters.description:
Available Coin :
- bsc
- ftm
- eth
- arbitrum
- stellar
- solana
- bch
- algorand
- ton
- xrp
- matic
- ltc
- doge
- tron

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com/bsc/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com/{coin}/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com/{coin}/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chainshub2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
